We're here to partner with you on everything from recruiting and your people ops strategy to technology implementations as you navigate the path to success ! Tasked with building the team, culture and People plan for an international SaaS company opening US operations.  Within 3 months we had a high-performing team of Sales, Customer Success, and Finance professionals.   Primary stakeholder in all culture initiatives, infrastructure planning and HRIS implementations.  (Funding for US Operations was pulled unexpectedly in March 2017)Highlights:â€¢	Brought in as Head of HR and Recruiting to create and execute on overall HR and People program         for US operations of a German-based company â€¢	Grew team from 2 employees to 35 sales and customer success leaders within 3 months using         grassroots, network and social recruiting strategy â€¢	Implement fundamental People Ops framework for talent acquisition, onboarding, training,         payroll, benefits, compliance and cultureâ€¢	Provided strategy, guidance and support to German parent company regarding all things People

Strategic and tactical partner to multiple lines of business, internally and externally, providing high level of service for talent acquisition and development, infrastructure creation and maintenance, and expansion of visibility and brand for a high-growth technology company.  During my tenure, I've been fortunate enough to be a driver for 200% growth in our team, one of the leaders in building a progressive and employee-centric culture, the project manager for implementation of HRIS and direct participant for the incorporation of a subsidiary of our company that included off-shore development, QA and customer service teams.  As a the head of a small HR department, I've been able to work on all levels of projects and initiatives including on-boarding, professional development, performance evaluations, training, work-force strategy and benefits. I've led the full life cycle for recruiting top technology, sales, marketing and client services talent, leveraging minimal resources while still increasing the efficiency in our recruiting process to lower the time-to-hire ration from 90 days to 33 days in a highly competitive environment.
Assisting with operations and strategy of board.  Additionally recruitment of board members was a function of this position.

Solely responsible for the management of the daily operations of the Human Resource office including the administration of the human resources policies, procedures and programs and recruiting. Additional areas of accountability are departmental development, change management, employee relations, training and professional development, benefits, compensation, organizational development, and recruiting.
Assist with the Social Media strategy for Career Connectors, a non-profit that matches job seekers with employers, resources and other community partners.
Assist with the Social Media strategy for Career Connectors, a non-profit that matches job seekers with employers, resources and other community partners.

Bent But Not Broken provides emotional support, educational resources and financial assistance to patients living with Chronic Fatigue Immune Dysfunction (CFIDS)/Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS) and their caregivers.  As the Director of Operations, I work with other board members to support operational functions and recruiting efforts to increase growth of our board and our impact in the community.

As the Director of Operations, I work with other board members to support operational functions and recruiting efforts to increase growth of our board and our impact in the community.

Kristiana Laugen
Expansion at Handy
March 21, 2017, Kristiana managed Jennifer directly

Jen was much more than just our "head of people" as her title suggests, and I'd highly recommend her to any employer. As a small but growing start-up, a strong recruiting component was key to Homebell's success, and Jen definitely delivered strong results on the recruiting front. She was creative with her efforts, pulling from a variety of different recruiting pools and leveraging her strong network and industry expertise. She was able to get top talent into Homebell quickly and effectively throughout her entire time at Homebell, and I was impressed with how easily she could adjust her efforts depending on the role we needed fill. Jen filled a variety roles ranging from sales, customer service, upper management, and accounting.Beyond her recruiting efforts, Jen was instrumental in bringing Homebell to the next level and legitimizing us as a company from an HR perspective. She set up our on boarding process and put together an employee handbook that outlined all our company policies and procedures. She even saved us tens of thousands of dollars by switching us to a new payroll and benefits platform, an extremely difficult transition that Jen navigated adeptly and impressively.As I mentioned, though, Jen was much more than just a head of people. She was a true thought partner to the business and provided helpful suggestions for every department - sales, customer service, accounting, etc. In our leadership meetings, Jen always had suggestions and insights that greatly benefited all departments and the business as a whole.Jen's personal qualities also made her a great addition. Calm, a great listener, empathetic, and very intelligent. I cannot speak highly enough of Jen, and I greatly enjoyed working with her at Homebell.

Steve Booze
Chief Operations Officer at Genius Avenue
April 13, 2016, Steve managed Jennifer directly

Jennifer has reported to me for the past three years as the Human Resources and Recruiting Manager at AppointmentPlus.While Jennifer's title is HR & Recruiting Manager, the title does not accurately describe her actual contributions to the company. As a fast growing SaaS company that is just beginning to establish a strong leadership level, our managers look to her for advice and guidance on a how to navigate through a variety of employee situations and needs.Jennifer is responsible for developing the strategic vision for HR. She has created career roadmaps that complemented those individuals that wanted to take on more of a leadership role as well as those who wanted to immerse themselves in their technical aptitude. In addition to establishing process and procedures for employee onboarding to departure, and everything in between. She also sourced and implemented an HRIS (human resource information system) platform that has significantly increased our operational efficiency. Furthermore, she was a significant factor in our ability to successfully perform an international incorporation in India with our Hyderabad development and support team.Furthermore, externally, Jennifer is the unofficial face of AppointmentPlus. Her vast networking at local and regional events helps to promote the name of the company and enabled us to land top talent without significant recruiting fees. Internally, she is the source of positive energy and fun. Whether bringing in professionals to present on healthy living, financial investing or volunteering or just structuring monthly teambuilding exercises, Jennifer always keeps our staff engaged and enjoying a work/life balance.

Andy Polito
Director of Sales at Retailer Web Sevices
April 6, 2016, Jennifer was a client of Andyâ€™s

"Jennifer Rojas is the model of a consummate HR leader! It was a pleasure working with her! Coming in as a third-party partner, it was immediately clear that she very much wanted to provide her team with training and support that would be valuable, useful and productive. Her professionalism was second only to her obvious desire to create an environment where the team could learn and grown. Jennifer demonstrates complete understanding of the many moving parts within her organizational environment and possesses strong understanding of exactly how her contributions as an HR leader work cohesively with improving bottom line results. On one occasion I recall Jennifer asking me to review a job description for the sales team simply because she wanted to ensure it was as effective as possible. I appreciated her proactive approach and how she capitalized on the resources she had available to her. I was also impressed with how well she understood the different roles within sales (and the company, for that matter) which I think increased the impact and success she had on acquiring top talent. She is a well rounded Senior Level HR Professional that would be an asset to any organization. I hope to have the opportunity to work with her again! I would highly recommend her both personally and professionally."

April 5, 2016, Sara worked with Jennifer in different groups

Jennifer Rojas is a very strong HR leader and it was a pleasure working with her. The compassion and care that she showed in her dealings with challenging and complex situations was impressive. Her role spanned multiple functions from compliance and policy to employee relations to payroll to training and she handled them all with a high level of professionalism and competency.  She managed to balance being aware of the business needs with being an active advocate and trusted advisor for all the employees and managers within the different departments.  We worked on several initiatives and employee situations together and it was clear that she enjoyed collaborating to create a culture that was productive, supportive, and engaging.She is also a highly-skilled recruiter within the technology/SaaS industry where she leverages her network and social recruiting skills to successfully fill critical roles within Sales, Marketing, IT, Finance and Customer Service.  I was always very happy with the flow of the hiring process as well as the quality of candidates that were presented and found it relatively remarkable that she did not require a big budget to achieve those results.I would highly recommend Jennifer, personally and professionally.

Scott Butler
Experienced Sales Leader - Inside Sales Manager at DoorDash
March 13, 2017, Jennifer worked with Scott in different groups

I had the good fortune of working with Scott at Homebell.  He is an amazing sales professional and leader.  He was brought on as our first AE but we quickly realized that he had the right combination of experience, skill and drive to be promoted into a Head of Sales role.  He was a very active manager and took initiative to motivate, mentor and train the team.  He was responsible for being the face of sales to our global executive team, working with the team on time management, scripting and best practices AND creating, presenting and following up on product and sales training.  He is truly a leader who believes that his success was measured by the success of each individual on his team and he did all that he could to ensure that everyone was able to reach their maximum potential.  He will be an incredible asset to any team with which he works and leads!

I had the absolute pleasure of working with Nick at Homebell.  He was a very quick study on the nuances of our services as well as incredibly good at building rapport with clients quickly.  At Homebell, working successfully with clients meant building able to create trust and a solid relationship in a very short period of time and Nick was a strong member of our team because of his ability to do both of those things.  He was also diligent and knew how to manage his and pipeline so there was consistency.  In addition, he was very engaged in making the process, team and company successful by working and supporting various initiatives and providing useful feedback.  He has an open and collaborative attitude that will be an asset to any team with which he works!

summary: Having worked in industries ranging from Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) to Finance, I have a unique opportunity to use my experience in various companies to create a stronger partnership with our many lines of business. Additionally, I've used that understanding to facilitate a better employee and recruiting experience for teams, candidates, and our partners. I have been able to engage with some of the top talent in software development, sales, marketing, customer success and client services with growing companies from start-ups to well-established, hyper-growth businesses.  Being able to participate as a strategic leader as well as having an active role in the execution of the action plan of several companies has been an amazing opportunity to learn from an incredible group of people while leveraging my experience to assist them in their successful navigation of various stages of the company's development. I have truly enjoyed the journey on which my career has taken me and each milestone has added a new level of depth to my understanding of and passion for people, growing businesses, and technology.  I hope to continue to connect teams by creating a vision, story, and shared experience around incredible cultures and organizational objectives.
name: Jennifer Rojas
title: People Ops Leader | Talent Acquisition Enthusiast | Culture Cultivator
